topic.title: @nofish any plants for hub selection ?
topic.body: will be there any way to select the hub where i choice to store certain posts ? e.g. spanish posts in spanish hub and so on

topic.title: zerome is just returning "Content publish failed . "
topic.body:
> Content publish failed . 

and this on console

```
error: [Errno 32] Broken pipe
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/gevent/greenlet.py", line 534, in run
    result = self._run(*self.args, **self.kwargs)
  File "plugins/AnnounceZero/AnnounceZeroPlugin.py", line 69, in announceTracker
    onion = self.connection_server.tor_manager.getOnion(site.address)
  File "/Zero/src/Tor/TorManager.py", line 256, in getOnion
    self.site_onions[site_address] = self.addOnion()
  File "/Zero/src/Tor/TorManager.py", line 197, in addOnion
    res = self.request("ADD_ONION NEW:RSA1024 port=%s" % self.fileserver_port)
  File "/Zero/src/Tor/TorManager.py", line 229, in request
    return self.send(cmd)
  File "/Zero/src/Tor/TorManager.py", line 235, in send
    conn.send("%s\r\n" % cmd)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/gevent/_socket2.py", line 320, in send
    return sock.send(data, flags)
socket.error: [Errno 32] Broken pipe

```
